alert.note: Alert for Finney; Hodgeman; Lane; Ness (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 7:14PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Finney, southwestern Ness, northwestern Hodgeman, southeastern Lane and northeastern Gray Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 714 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kalvesta, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. Blowing dust is likely. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kalvesta around 720 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
